argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcvexch.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lcvexch.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcvexch.c | |- C = ( <oL ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lcvexch.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | lcvexch.t | |- ( ph -> T e. S ) |
| 6 |  | lcvexch.u | |- ( ph -> U e. S ) |
| 7 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( T i^i U ) C U ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( T i^i U ) C U ) -> T e. S ) |
| 9 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( T i^i U ) C U ) -> U e. S ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( T i^i U ) C U ) -> ( T i^i U ) C U ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 7, 8, 9, 10 | #P_lcvexchlem5 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( T i^i U ) C U ) -> T C ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 12 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ T C ( T .(+) U ) ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 13 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ T C ( T .(+) U ) ) -> T e. S ) |
| 14 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ T C ( T .(+) U ) ) -> U e. S ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ T C ( T .(+) U ) ) -> T C ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 12, 13, 14, 15 | #P_lcvexchlem4 | |- ( ( ph /\ T C ( T .(+) U ) ) -> ( T i^i U ) C U ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_impbida | |- ( ph -> ( ( T i^i U ) C U <-> T C ( T .(+) U ) ) ) |
